attributes.action: guarantee in a statement to the house and the people of Britain, the money gifted to Northern Rock Plc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is set out in order to obtain a guarentee from the British Government for a full return of monies 'lent' to the Northern Rock Plc Building Society. This petition further requires a statement from Mr Darling in the house to this effect.
